(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Application
Phone below 6.5″ like Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. 4″-6.5″devices： Such as Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. Motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel. Sedans,Vans,SUVs,Trucks and Jeep.Such as Ford (Focus ST Explorer)、 Honda CRV、 Toyota （Corolla E350 ）、Chrysler （Mini Van 2019 f250）、 Equinox 、Canyon 、Nissan （Pathfinder）、Rogue、 Murano、 Traverse 、Acadia（2014 GMC ）and etc.

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

  • Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .
  • This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.

  • Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.
  • Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Product Description

FAQs

Does it require Internet?

Yes, Photoshare Frames need to be online in order to recieve new photos. However, photos can also be uploaded manually via SD card or USB thumb drive if you prefer

Who can send photos?

Frame owners can share their Frame ID or email address with all their family and friends. There is no limit!

How many photos will it hold?

PhotoShare Frames have 8GB of storage and hold 5,000+ photos

Are there fees or subscriptions?

No! There are no fees or subscriptions to use or send photos to PhotShare Frames. Even the PhotoShare Frame app is free.

How is it powered?

PhotoShare Frames need to be plugged in to use and enjoy. Each frame comes with an A/C power adapter and there is a USB port if you prefer to use a USB cord.

Easily send photos and video clips from phones to frames in seconds with the free PhotoShare Frame App, Email, Facebook, or Google Photos
Smart Digital Photo Frame with 10.1″ vibrant HD Touchscreen Display
WiFi enabled to receive photos from anywhere, anytime – keeping you connected to loved ones, no matter how far
Quick & Easy one-minute setup
No fees – invite all your friends and family to share photos too!

item.title: Best Pet Supplies 2-in-1 Stuffless Squeaky Dog Toys with Soft, Durable Fabric for Small, Medium, and Large Pets, No Stuffing for Indoor Play, Holds a Plastic Bottle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) THE 2-IN-1 DOG TOY THAT LASTS THROUGH ALL THE FUN Keep them Intrigued It squeaks. It s cute. It s that one dog toy your pup won t want to let go! Our soft, non-stuffed dog toys are designed to tease out the playful side of your pup. It comes ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:36:50 UTC – Details)


THE 2-IN-1 DOG TOY THAT LASTS THROUGH ALL THE FUN Keep them Intrigued It squeaks. It s cute. It s that one dog toy your pup won t want to let go! Our soft, non-stuffed dog toys are designed to tease out the playful side of your pup. It comes with one squeaker in the head and another in the tail to make every bite a delight. You can even fit a plastic bottle through the self fastener opening at the bottom to add a crunch that will drive pooch happily wild! Choose between our fun animal designs and treat your dog to a toy that will keep them occupied for ages to come. Designed to Last Does your dog tear apart stuffed plush toys in no time? Well they might have just met their match because these toys have no stuffing to pull out! Our stuffing free toys are perfect for aggressive chewers, and hold up well to countless games of tug & toss. We ve designed them in multiple sizes to suit just about any breed. Whether you have a husky or pug, Labrador or yorkie, you ll find the right dog toy to complement their size and energy. Here s why you ll love these 2 in 1 dog toys: Made using 100% toxin free materials to keep your pup safe. Natural shape and texture sparks your dog s natural instincts. Can be safely washed to quickly remove dirt and odor. Well priced to give you great value for money. Treat your pooch to a dog toy that will keep them fascinatingly engaged for extended play time. Click ‘ Add to Cart now!
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.5 x 8 x 1.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT07-08-45-47-M
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 20, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZK7MGQJ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

KEEP YOUR DOG INTRIGUED: With a squeaker in the head and another in the tail, this stuffing-free dog toy makes every bite a delightfully squeaky treat. These squeaky dog toys also have self fastener at the bottom that you can open up and place a plastic bottle in to introduce a fun crunch into the mix.
CUTE DOG TOY: Our no stuffing dog toys come in fun animal designs. Available in wild duck, fox, raccoon, deer, hare, snow leopard and other styles, these unique dog toys will spark your dog’s natural instincts to hunt and play.
FOR ALL BREEDS: Whether you have a Great Dane or a little Chihuahua, you’ll find the perfect-sized squeaky unstuffed dog toy from our collection. Each of these fun skins come in small, medium and large sizes to fit your dog’s size and age.
GREAT GIFT: Whether you’re looking for an exciting birthday, holiday or a just-because gift for your furbaby, you can’t go wrong with these incredibly fun dog toys. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
